abstract: Investment in infrastructure construction and repair is an efficient way to create jobs, an economist writes.
snippet: Investment in infrastructure construction and repair is an efficient way to create jobs, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: Laura D'Andrea Tyson is a professor at the Haas School of Business at the University of California, Berkeley, and served as chairwoman of the Council of Economic Advisers under President Clinton.

headline.main: The Infrastructure Twofer: Jobs Now and Future Growth
